title: Should Value Investors Stay at Cheap Hotels? The Values of Value Investing - Ep 7
itunes:title: Should Value Investors Stay at Cheap Hotels? The Values of Value Investing - Ep 7
description:
Is value investing simply about buying cheap stocks? A question from a reader prompts Vitaliy's discussion of how value investing evolved from its origins with Ben Graham to its current application under Warren Buffett and why it's not really about buying "cheap stuff".

You can read this article online at https://contrarianedge.com/values-value-investing/
